last_episode_to_air.name: In a Dark Place
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Dena Raley-McCluskey vanishes from Modesto, CA, investigators focus on her ex-boyfriend with whom she had a known tumultuous relationship. Scant clues stump the police for years until an unexpected break in the case uncovers the shocking truth.

name: Gone
overview: Twisted true stories of people who have gone missing, leaving behind secrets and frantic loved ones; these missing persons investigations lead to unexpected outcomes.

episodes.name: Field of Broken Dreams
episodes.overview: 17-yr-old Chris Daigle vanishes shortly after leaving Hightower High School for the day in Missouri City, TX. Family members and law officials spend years dissecting the weeks and months leading up to the day the baseball all star disappears.

episodes.name: Troubled Waters
episodes.overview: Teenagers Cheryl Miller and Pam Jackson go out to enjoy the first day of summer break in the small town of Vermillion, South Dakota and vanish. Although rumors spread for years, the families never give up hope. Then one day, the mystery is revealed.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: Charlotte Moriarty and her infant son take a five-minute stroll to the market on the small island of Oahu, Hawaii, and never come home. It will take more than 30 years to find out what happened to the mother and baby on the day that they vanished.

episodes.name: Devil Among Us
episodes.overview: When Lynda McClelland goes missing from her home in Forest Hills, Pennsylvania she leaves behind three beloved grandchildren and a daughter who is heartbroken.  An agonizing search uncovers answers that lie painfully close to home.

episodes.name: Missing Michele
episodes.overview: Thirty-two-year-old Michele Whitaker is leading a troubled life when she disappears without a trace; her family and police investigate every possible lead for six years, then, a telephone call gives them the answers they're looking for.

episodes.name: In a Dark Place
episodes.overview: When Dena Raley-McCluskey vanishes from Modesto, CA, investigators focus on her ex-boyfriend with whom she had a known tumultuous relationship. Scant clues stump the police for years until an unexpected break in the case uncovers the shocking truth.
